data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Arad, Romania that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arad, Romania

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 415,800 souls in Arad and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 15 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 26,319 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Arad.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Arad, Romania to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, make the 363,102 people in the state of Arad who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Arad to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Arad, Romania need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

location.name: Arad
location.people_groups_list: Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking, Tatar, South Asian, general, Jew, Romanian, Tatar, Crimean
